alert.note: Alert for Grant; Kay (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 2:28PM CDT until September 19 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Kay County in northern Oklahoma... Southeastern Grant County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 228 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Nardin to 3 miles southwest of Deer Creek to near Jefferson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Blackwell, Tonkawa, Lamont, Deer Creek, Jefferson, and Nardin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
